panels.description: Most views here assume that there was no stats reset in the selected time range!

value.title: Opens 'Table details' dashboard for that table

targets.rawSql:
select
  x.*,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8 as last_vacuum,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8 as last_analyze
from (
SELECT
  dbname,
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  max((data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8) as total_relation_size,
  max((data->'table_size_b')::int8) as data_size
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 3 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT $top
) x
join lateral (select data from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1) y on true
/*idea: show only primaries? */

value.title: Opens 'Table details' dashboard for that table

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  x.*,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8 as last_vacuum,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8 as last_analyze
FROM (
SELECT
  dbname,
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  max((data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8) as total_relation_size,
  max((data->'table_size_b')::int8) as data_size
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 4 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT $top
) x
join lateral (select data from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1) y on true

targets.query: select dbname, table_full_name,  top(growth, $top)  as growth from (SELECT spread("total_relation_size_b") as growth FROM "table_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, table_full_name fill(none))
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  x.*,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8 as last_vacuum,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8 as last_analyze
FROM (
  SELECT
    dbname,
    tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
    max((data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8) - min((data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8) as growth,
    max((data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8) as total_relation_size
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
  GROUP BY 1, 2
  ORDER BY growth DESC NULLS LAST
  LIMIT $top
) x
join lateral (select data from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1) y on true

/*
-- for fully correct but slow version:
SELECT
  dbname,
  table_full_name,
  max(last_value) - max(first_value) as growth,
  max(last_value) as total_relation_size,
  max(last_vacuum) as last_vacuum,
  max(last_analyze) as last_analyze
FROM (
  SELECT
    dbname,
    tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
    first_value((data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8) over w,
    last_value((data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8) over w,
    last_value((data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8) over w as last_vacuum,
    last_value((data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8) over w as last_analyze
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time)
    AND dbname IN ($dbname)
    WINDOW w AS (partition by dbname, tag_data->>'table_full_name' order by time rows BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING)
) x
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 3 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT $top
*/

value.title: Opens 'Table details dashboard for that table

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  x.*,
  (data->'table_size_b')::int8 as table_size,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8 as last_vacuum,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8 as last_analyze
FROM (
SELECT
  dbname,
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  max((data->'seq_scan')::int8) - min((data->'seq_scan')::int8) as seq_scan
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND (data->'table_size_b')::int8 > 100000000
GROUP BY
  1, 2
HAVING
  max((data->'seq_scan')::int8) > min((data->'seq_scan')::int8)
ORDER BY
  3 DESC
LIMIT
  $top
) x
join lateral (select data from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1) y on true

value.title: Opens 'Table details' dashboard for that table

targets.query: select dbname, table_full_name, top(ins, $top) as "ins" from (select mean(ins) as "ins" from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("n_tup_ins"), 1h) as "ins" FROM "table_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), dbname, table_full_name fill(0)) GROUP BY dbname, table_full_name)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  x.*,
  (data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8 as total_relation_size,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8 as last_vacuum,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8 as last_analyze
FROM (
SELECT
  dbname,
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  max((data->'n_tup_ins')::int8) - min((data->'n_tup_ins')::int8) as ins
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY
  1, 2
HAVING
  max((data->'n_tup_ins')::int8) > min((data->'n_tup_ins')::int8)
ORDER BY
  3 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT
  $top
) x
join lateral (select data from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1) y on true

targets.query: select dbname, table_full_name, top(ins, $top) as "upd" from (select mean(ins) as "ins" from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("n_tup_upd"), 1h) as "ins" FROM "table_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), dbname, table_full_name fill(0)) GROUP BY dbname, table_full_name)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  x.*,
  (data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8 as total_relation_size,  
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8  as last_vacuum,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8 as last_analyze
FROM (
SELECT
  dbname,
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  max((data->'n_tup_upd')::int8) - min((data->'n_tup_upd')::int8) as upd -- assumes no reset
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY
  1, 2
HAVING
  max((data->'n_tup_upd')::int8) > min((data->'n_tup_upd')::int8)
ORDER BY
  3 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT
  $top
) x
join lateral (select data from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1) y on true

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  x.*,
  (data->'total_relation_size_b')::int8 as total_relation_size,  
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8  as last_vacuum,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8 as last_analyze
FROM (
SELECT
  dbname,
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  max((data->'n_tup_del')::int8) - min((data->'n_tup_del')::int8) as del
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY
  1, 2
HAVING
  max((data->'n_tup_del')::int8) > min((data->'n_tup_del')::int8)
ORDER BY
  3 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT
  $top
) x
join lateral (select data from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1) y on true

panels.description: Based on pg_statio_user_tables. Assumes  8KB page size (change the query if not so). Also note that due to OS file system cache only some reads will hit the disk

value.title: Opens 'Table details' dashboard for that table

targets.query: select dbname, table_full_name, top(ins, $top) as "del" from (select mean(ins) as "ins"  from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("n_tup_del"), 1h) as "ins"  FROM "table_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), dbname, table_full_name fill(0)) GROUP BY dbname, table_full_name)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  x.*,
  (data->'table_size_b')::int8 as data_size,
  (data->'seq_scan')::int8 - (select (data->'seq_scan')::int8 from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time limit 1) as seq_scan,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8  as last_vacuum,
  (data->'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8 as last_analyze
FROM (
SELECT
  dbname,
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_full_name,
  8192 * (coalesce(max((data->'heap_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->'heap_blks_read')::int8), 0) + coalesce(max((data->'toast_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->'toast_blks_read')::int8), 0) + coalesce(max((data->'tidx_blks_read')::int8) - min((data->'tidx_blks_read')::int8), 0)) as blks_read
FROM
  table_io_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
GROUP BY
  1, 2
HAVING
  max((data->'heap_blks_read')::int8) > min((data->'heap_blks_read')::int8)
ORDER BY
  3 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT
  $top
) x
join lateral (select data from table_stats where dbname = x.dbname and tag_data->>'table_full_name' = x.table_full_name and $__timeFilter(time) order by time desc limit 1) y on true

panels.title: Most block IO reads

options.content: Brought to you by

1.text: WARNING - stats reset detected for selected time range, results are unreliable

targets.rawSql:
select
0 as time,
coalesce ((

select 1 from (
select
  tag_data->>'table_full_name' as table_name,
  (data->'seq_scan')::int8 as seq_scan,
  lag((data->'seq_scan')::int8) over (partition by tag_data->>'table_full_name' order by time) as seq_scan_lag
from
  table_stats
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and not tag_data->>'schema' ~* 'temp'
  and tag_data->>'table_full_name' in (select tag_data->>'table_full_name' from table_stats where $__timeFilter(time) and dbname = '$dbname' limit 500)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
) x
where seq_scan_lag > seq_scan
limit 1

), 0) as was_reset

list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics WHERE metric = 'table_stats' ORDER BY 1;
